section.p: This class contains attributes related to contrast media administation associated with this Rad/Nuc Med exam.

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] contrastMedia, where its type is Orderable Pharmacy Item
Identifies the contrast agent(s) associated with this Rad/Nuc Med exam. Possible values are Ionic Iodinated; Non-ionic Iodinated; Gadolinium; Cholecystographic; Gastrografin; Barium; unspecified contrast media; etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Primary Performer

Contains zero or more [0..*] contrastMedia, where its type is Orderable Pharmacy Item
Identifies the contrast agent(s) associated with this Rad/Nuc Med exam. Possible values are Ionic Iodinated; Non-ionic Iodinated; Gadolinium; Cholecystographic; Gastrografin; Barium; unspecified contrast media; etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] performer, where its type is Primary Performer
